item.title: Junit4加载spring配置文件进行单元测试
item.description: 配置BaseTest，然后后面的测试类继承此类即可进行单元测试 基类 @RunWith(SpringJUnit4ClassRunner.class) // 告诉junit spring配置文件 @ContextConfiguration({ "classpath:spring/spring-dao.xml", "classpath:spring/spring-service.xml" }) public class BaseTest { } 测试类 public class AreaDaoTest extends BaseTest{ @Autowired private AreaDao areaDao; @Test public void testQueryArea() { List<Area> listArea=new ArrayList<Area>(); listArea=areaDao.queryArea(); System.out.println(listArea.size()); } }
